response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its true value to be well beyond its asking price. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $500,000. This price reflects my confidence in its ability to deliver substantial benefits to you, while also ensuring a fair return on investment for us. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 500000}
